description: Welcome to Radonti, A Planet of evolve rodents
name: Welcome to Radonti

description: Entering a hot dessert planet name Sauria, Strong winds and sandstorm occur everyday here.
name: Welcome to Sauria

description: A harsh zone planet rule by the empress of Steel. Radiations are everywhere, you might need a LEAD Suit doing expedition here.
name: Welcome to Enthuli

description: A humanity last hope, this planet is refered as Earth2.0 as this is the perfect copy of earth where living organism is possible here.
name: Welcome to Earth 2.0

description: A harsh zone planet rule by the empress of Steel. Radiations are everywhere, you might need a LEAD Suit doing expedition here.
name: Welcome to Steelicus

description: You decided to stay here temporarily. During your stay, you encounter a creature ressembling a Rat species of earth but bigger.
name: Welcome to Radonti

description: Decided to stay on Sauria, a harsh dessert planet. Wherever you look, its just all plain sand.
name: Welcome to Sauria

description: Enthuli Description
name: Welcome to Enthuli

description: Upon landing here, you witness some few people here who also decided to stay here as their new homes.
name: Welcome to Earth

description: After searching for a best way to land, you saw  a bunch of metals and scraps here. Its technoloy is highly advance compare to human technology however it looks like whoever lives here doesn't invite any guess.
name: Welcome to Steelicus

description: You decided to leave Radonti
name: Saying no to rats

description: You decided to leave Sauria
name: No to sand

description: Enthuli Description
name: Saying no to Enthuli

description: You decided to leave Earth2.0
name: Saying no to Earth2.0

description: You decided to leave Steelicus
name: Saying no to Steelicus

description: Lowering shuttle power for this cycle
name: Rest your Body

description: Continuing navigation, setting shuttle power settings to default.
name: Continue Navigation

description: Hello captain, I am your assistant, N.O.V.A (Neural Operations and Vitality Assistant). Earth has been destroyed; you got out safely. Congratulations. You and your crew grow very tired after what just happened. I suggest resting this cycle for you and your crew, or we could continue our navigation of this space shuttle.
name: Welcome to Orbits

description: You and your crew carefully mined the asteroid and found fuel.
name: Mine Carefully

description: You and your crew aggressively mined the asteroid and found fuel
name: Mine Aggressively

description: You left the asteroid untouched
name: Leave the asteroid be

description: Captain, I detect a mineral rich asteroid approaching. We could mine it for Hydro carbic resources if we have your permission
name: Asteroid Mining

description: The material seems to be the ones used for Biogene!
name: Gather the unidentified material.

description: You steer clear of the cluster
name: Stay safe and leave the cluster

Choice-2: Stay safe and leave the cluster
description: Captain, I detected a cluster of asteroids near your vicinity. After a scan, I discovered an unidentified material inside of the asteroid.
name: Unidentified Cluster

description: You accepted their help, and they gave you some supplies in return.
name: Trade fuel

description: You accepted their help, and they gave you some supplies in return.
name: Trade spare parts

description: A starship seems to be approaching the shuttle. They identify themselves as the F.E.L.A.S (Federation of Extraterrestrial Lifeform Assistance and Supplies). They are offering some help after what happened to your planet for 2 choices. Choice 1 exchange some materials for some fuel or Choice 2 exchange some materials for some spare parts. Should we try and accept their help?
name: All my FELAS

description: You turned the energy into extra fuel
name: Convert it to power the ship immediately

description: The ship was cool and the crew felt relaxed
name: Use the energy to cool the ship

description:
Captain, as we passed a nearby star, your solar panels have accumulated some extra energy. You have 2 choices.
1. Do you want to use it immediately for our fuel supply 
or 
2. Do you want to use it to cool the ship?
name: Extra Solar Power

description: You found a dying rat inside the crate. It immediately lunges on one crew before lying flat on the floor.
name: Green Crate

description: You found a plant inside the crate, although it might not live for long due to the environment, it can still supply us with oxygen.
name: Black Crate

description: You found a pile of... Nothing inside the crate.
name: Brown Crate

description: You found a burnt image of Valentina Tereshkova. It feels like it’s staring back at your crew.
name: Blue Crate

description: Captain, I discovered a nearby crate full sealed organisms. The organisms are unknown, which crate should we take?
name: Mystery Crates

description: It seems to be frozen cans of oxygen. It still has some oxygen left.
name: Take the ice that hit your shuttle

description: The shuttle steered clear before getting hit with more ice.
name: Steer clear

Choice-1: Take the ice that hit your shuttle
description: Frozen cans start to hit your shuttle, do you want to take the ice or steer clear of them?
name: Frozen Hitter

description: The vast amount of crystals was hauled inside the ship
name: Take the Crystals immediately

description: Some crystals were shaved off after the dust settled.
name: Wait until the dust settles

description: Captain, crystal minerals have been building outside of the shuttle due to the immense dust. The data suggests that it is the same composition as medicine. It might be risky though, due to the dust outside. What’s your call?
name: Medical Crystals

description: Your crew gathered some fuel for your ship while traversing the route.
name: Take the asteroid field route

description: Your crew found old crates full of spare parts floating while traversing the route.
name: Take the old trade route

description: Captain, based on my database, I have uncovered a star chart ahead of our location. We can take two routes from here. One is a fuel rich asteroid field, and the other is an old route for trade.
name: Across 2 Paths

description: Your crew received FELAS’s help.
name: Accept it gratefully

description: FELAS offered you ration instead of fuel.
name: Refuse their pity

description:
A vessel of F.E.L.A.S (Federation of Extraterrestrial Lifeform Assistance and Supplies) they are offering you 2 choices.
1. Fuel 
2. Food 
The leader that wants to hand the supplies identifies as Yuri Gagarin.
name: The FELAS are Back

description: The rodents gave you food as a warm welcome to you and your crew
name: Humbly introduce yourself

description: The rodent was hesitant to welcome you. They gave you some rations as a welcome to you and your crew to their planet.
name: Display your magnificence

description: Captain, data shows that this planet is deemed to be safe for human respiration. Earlier, a creature approached our shuttle with a similar composition to earth’s rodents. It seems they want to make peace with your crew.
name: Welcome to the Rodent Community

description: You offered some of your fuel to the rodents
name: Give some Fuel

description: You offered some of your biogene to the rodents
name: Give some Biogene

description: You turned down their offer.
name: Refuse their Offer

description: One of the Rodents is offering you a bundle of tiny crops in exchange for a foreign substance that they have not encountered yet. It seems that they want to further their research using substances in our civilization.
name: Chemical into Food

description: You stayed to lead the Rodents.
name: Be the leader that they need

description: You prepared yourself to say your farewells to the rodent when the time come.
name: Say your farewells to the rodent

Choice-1: Be the leader that they need
Choice-2: Say your farewells to the rodent
description: Captain, after staying for a few days on the planet, I have determined the rodents direly needed a proper leader to further develop their society. Recently they have been offering you a position as their leader here in this planet. Should you choose to stay, you and your crew will have to lead the rodents or otherwise say your farewell to them.
name: To Lead or not To Lead

description: The crew manages a quick fix, stabilizing the airlock but using extra resources in the rush.
name: Fix the airlock immediately

description: The airlock is patched but not fully secured, leaving the oxygen levels slightly lower than optimal.
name: Partially fix the airlock

description: A malfunction has compromised the integrity of the airlock. Oxygen is rapidly depleting, immediate repairs are required. We can partially repair it for lesser spareparts or we can repair it immediately repair the whole damage.
name: Airlock Unlocked

description: Your crew gathered the debris of what is assumed the ISS carefully.
name: Gather the materials carefully

description: Your crew tried to gather as much materials as you can before they float away
name: Gather as much materials as possible

Choice-2: Gather as much materials as possible
description: There is debris with the ISS logo on it outside the ship. We can gather those debris for materials. We can gather most of the material carefully or we can all go and take as much as possible. What approach do we do?
name: The ISS Debris(?)

description: You and your friend made a tribute for the space dog.
name: Offer a tribute to Laika

description: You and your crew continue navigating space without batting an eye.
name: Continue navigating

description: We are near the orbital path of Sputnik, where Laika, the first animal in space, once orbited. We could honor her with a brief tribute.
name: The Space Dog

description: The canning company gave you Rations.
name: Trade spare parts for foods

description: You and your crew left the event.
name: Leave the Event

description: A shipment of a canning company has been seen hosting a trade event for foods in exchange for scraps. Should we take part in the event, Captain?
name: The Canning Company

description: The alien technology produced biogenetic materials that we can use!
name: Examine the alien technology

description: You received a bunch of spare parts from the alien technology.
name: Dismantle the technology

description: Captain, I have retrieved an old alien technology near our vicinity. We could examine it for its usage, or we could scrap it for spare parts. What is your action?
name: Alien Technology?!

description: You accepted the gift from FELAS
name: Accept the gift

description: You refused their gift
name: Refuse the gift

description: Another vessel from F.E.L.A.S has been detected, captain. Their leader has been thinking fondly of you and your crew and has given you a gift. Should we accept their gift?
name: The FELAS' Gift

description: You found a box of Rations behind the oxygen container!
name: Check the corners of the room

description: You ignored the unknown presence.
name: Leave it be

Choice-1: Check the corners of the room
description: Captain, I have detected an unknown presence on the storage room. I suggest immediate investigation of the room.
name: An Unknown Presence?

description: The amazing view of the nebula is shown in front of your crew's eyes.
name: Bask in the beauty of the nebula

description: You ignored the nebula and proceeded to navigate space
name: Continue travels

Choice-1: Bask in the beauty of the nebula
description: We are now approaching a charted nebula. If you look outside, you can immediately see it. I suggest staying for a while to see this once in a lifetime scenery.
name: A Nebulae Experience

description: The beauty of the comet shower astounded your crew
name: Watch the comet with your crew

description: You navigated space without batting an eye
name: Continue travels

Choice-1: Watch the comet with your crew
description: Captain, an extremely rare comet shower is occurring outside the shuttle. I suggest you take a rest and go see the event with the rest of your crew.
name: A Comet Shower

description: You fostered the resilience of the crew of Apollo 13's past
name: Foster resilience

description: Your crew produced extra spare parts from scraps
name: Use morale boost to improve productivity

Choice-2: Use morale boost to improve productivity
description: The story of Apollo 13’s safe return after disaster is boosting crew confidence, inspiring adaptability in critical situations
name: Apollo 13 Resilience

description: Your crew set up a memorial for the Icons of the past
name: Set up a memorial

description: Your crew skipped the celebration and continued navigating space
name: Skip the celebration

description: We are near the Apollo 11 mission's historic path. Would you like to log a memorial entry in honor of Neil Armstrong and Buzz Aldrin?
name: The Apollo 11

description: The contents were untouched and intact
name: Open it using a crowbar

description: The crate toppled down, shattering some of the contents
name: Forcefully Open it

description: The contents of the crate was shattered and turned to dust. What do you expect?
name: Throw the crate

description: One of the debris of SpaceX is currently locked in a crate, if we can open it, we could use the debris as a spare part. It is very fragile though, so we might need equipment to open it.
name: SpaceX Spacecraft Space Debris

description: The fruit was succulent and filling! You set some aside for later consumption
name: Consume the purple cactus fruit

description: You discarded the fruit
name: Discard it

description: During your stay on the sands, you found a peculiar fruit growing on a purple cactus. I have scanned it to be edible, but the side effects of consumption are unknown. Should we try and forage the fruit?
name: The Weird Fruit

description: The robot gratefully gave you some of its fuel container
name: Exchange with the robot

description: The robot looked down while slowly accepting its fate.
name: Ignore its plea

description: One of the bots on the planet is searching for parts to fix its broken plating. It offered to trade you some of its fuel cans in exchange for some of your scrap parts. Should we accept their offer?
name: The robot's plea

description: The refugees gave you some of their spare scraps. They think it would be useful for your crew
name: Exchange with the refugees

description: The refugees said they understand and walked away.
name: Refuse their offer

description: You finally found people from earth that escaped the impact of the meteor. They offer your crew some spare parts from their travels in exchange for food. What action should we take, captain?
name: In need for Food

description: You finally found the rest of the humanity that left earth. You stayed with them to rebuild what was lost in your home planet.
name: Stay with the rest of the Human

description: You decided to leave and explore the space once the time is right.
name: Travel space once more

Choice-1: Stay with the rest of the Human
description: After trying to survive for months, you and your crew finally met humans from earth. You can stay with them, try and build the community back, or you can leave Earth 2 and travel through space with your crew once again. Whatever your choice is, your crewmate is with you, captain.
name: To be with Humanity once again.

description: The mold grew from the rations. After a while you removed it.
name: Let the mold grow a bit more.

description: You got rid of the mold; you didn’t have enough to create biogene.
name: Get rid of it immediately.

Choice-1: Let the mold grow a bit more
description: Captain, there was a report of mold growing inside the storage, but this variant might be cultivated for biogene. Should we let it grow for a little bit more time?
name: Biogenetic Mold

description: The crew salvages parts but risks encountering hostiles.
name: Head to the destroyed shuttle.

description: The crew Maintains a safe distance, avoiding risk.
name: It might be an ambush

description: Captain, I suggest replacing our radio wave transmitter and receiver. I just happened to scan a nearby destroyed shuttle with the same model as ours.
name: Transmitting Replacement

description: The tape works effectively on fixing the shutters.
name: Fix the shutters using the duct tape

description: The crew uses spare parts as an alternative for duct tape.
name: Fix the shutters using spare parts

description: The crew suffers minor damage from the solar flare but conserves resources.
name: Brace for Impact

Choice-4: Fix the shutters using duct tape
description: Captain, I detected an eminent solar flare. One of the shutters seems to be ripping off. We could use duct tape to fix the shutters or use spare parts as an alternative.
name: Upcoming Solar Flare

description: The damage after you pass the magnetic field is fixed
name: Proceed and fix the damages later

description: Your crew took a route that is further than the original.
name: Find and go to an alternate route

Choice-1:
Proceed and fix the
damages later
Choice-2:
Find and go to an
alternate route
description: Captain, the navigation has detected a magnetic field ahead. Should we proceed or find an alternate path. If you choose to proceed, we will need to fix the damage that we will sustain.
name: Magnetic Dynamo

description: The Orbiter glided through the low gravity field
name: Glide through the field

description: Your crew were skeptical of the effect of low gravity.
name: Try to find an alternative path

Choice-2: Try to find an alternative path
description: Captain, sensors indicate a nearby low-gravity field. I recommend drifting through to conserve fuel. However, mapping this anomaly could also be beneficial for us.
name: Low-grav Pathway

description: The unusual material has medicinal properties!
name: Study it further

description: The crew avoid any potential risk from the unknown phenomenon
name: Keep our distance

description: Captain, the crew reports a peculiar signal from a nearby coordinate with unknown materials. Scans reveal energy patterns that match no known phenomenon. Shall we study it further or keep our distance?
name: A Peculiar Area

description: The engine is optimized, increasing operational stability
name: Invest in Maintenance

description: The engine suffers from wear, impacting operational efficiency
name: Ignore Maintenance

description: Captain, engine maintenance is due. Ignoring it could reduce fuel efficiency. A small investment in resources now may save us in the long run.
name: Engineous Maintenance

description: The pirates accepted the bribe and left your shuttle.
name: Give them what they want

description: The shuttle was damaged but the escape was successful
name: Attempt to Escape

description: A hostile vessel detected on our scanners, Captain. It’s displaying pirate insignia. Shall we offer a bribe to avoid conflict, or attempt an escape?
name: Ahoy!

description: The crew repairs the communication system
name: Investigate further

description: Communication seems to have resumed after a delay.
name: Wait until the signal resumes

description: All external communications are down. I’m attempting to trace the issue. We can either investigate further or wait until the signal resumes
name: Communication Excommunication

description: The light revealed to be harmless probe that left after a brief communication
name: Attempt Communication

description: The crew prepares for conflict using shields made from spare parts, but the light leaves after a few minutes.
name: Prepare for defense

description: Captain, a strange light is following our shuttle, I can’t detect whether they are hostile or not. What actions do you suggest?
name: A Strange Light

description: Regina neutralizes the gas, preventing it from spreading but using resources.
name: Create a solution to neutralize the toxic gas

description: The gas is removed quickly, but the crew suffers due to sudden loss of oxygen.
name: Vent the entire room immediately

description: Controlled venting reduces gas exposure and sudden loss of oxygen but allows some toxin to linger contaminating food rations.
name: Vent the room slowly

HiddenChoice: Create a solution to neutralize the toxic gas
description: Alert: Toxic gas leak detected in the medical bay. Immediate venting is required, or additional resources may help neutralize it safely. Venting the room would reduce the oxygen for you and your crew.
name: Toxic Gas Leak

description: The circuitry is fully repaired, reducing the chance of future issues but requiring more resources.
name: Use more resources to ensure that it won’t be faulty again.

description: The repair is less thorough, thus leading to some minor electrical shocks leaving the system vulnerable to future faults.
name: Try to save some resources.

description: The rations was saved but the biogene was left behind.
name: Save the Ration

description: The Biogene was saved but the rations was left behind
name: Save the Biogene

description: Captain, we have an Apollo 13 protocol at bay. An oxygen tank suddenly exploded, we might need to choose what to save between the some of the ration or the biogene.
name: Apollo 13 Protocol

Choice-1: Use more resourcec to ensure that it won't be faulty again
description: Captain, I’m detecting an electrical fault in the ship’s circuitry. Ignoring it may compromise essential functions of the shuttle. Immediate repairs are strongly recommended.
name: Faulty Electricity
